statements: DELETE FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_name = 'Restricted Area';
DELETE FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_name = 'Restricted Zone'
DELETE FROM zone_boundaries WHERE zone_id IN (SELECT zone_id FROM protected_zones WHERE zone_name LIKE 'North%');
DELETE FROM zone_restrictions WHERE zone_id = 1 AND restriction_type = 'No Entry';
DELETE FROM zone_activities WHERE activity_id = 200 AND activity_type = 'Sightseeing';
DELETE FROM zone_visitors WHERE zone_id = 5 AND visitor_name = 'Alice';
